item.description:
Paul, who puts on this dance, has his own meetup group, SuperSingles(TM), where this is also listed.

8:00 pm - 12:00 am ( $12. before 9pm, $15. after 9pm)

If I can have 10 of us from my meetup group event listings sign up for this ahead of time I can send Paul a list of names to get you a $10 admission.

I am listing this with other groups.

Free Dance Lesson @ 7:30pm, Top DJ Dance Music, Complimentary Hor D'ouevres, Special Dance Performance, Raffle, Door Prizes and Cash Bar .

There was a good turn-out for the dance here in January.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for My Meetup Sign or ask for Neil.
item.name: Singles' Dance
